#️⃣ #AQA #QBIT #FreeMoney #NextGenCrypto #ZeroFees #BlockchainPower  
——————————————

🧠 AQA vs Bitcoin – For Dummies

1️⃣ Creator & Control  
• Bitcoin: Launched in 2009 by “Satoshi Nakamoto” (unknown). Controlled by miners & whales.  
• AntiQua: No CEO. No central authority. Controlled by YOU.

2️⃣ Fees & Costs  
• Bitcoin: Fees spike during congestion.  
• AntiQua: 0 fees forever. Each block gives 50 AQA. You pay nothing.

3️⃣ Consensus & Mining  
• Bitcoin: PoW using SHA-256. Centralization risk.  
• AntiQua: PoW + TurboSync using post-quantum Dilithium-5.

4️⃣ Cryptography & Future-Proofing  
• Bitcoin: Breakable by future quantum tech.  
• AntiQua: Resistant: Dilithium-5, Kyber, SHAKE256, BLAKE3.

5️⃣ Peer Discovery & Networking  
• Bitcoin: Relies on static DNS/IPs.  
• AntiQua: Self-healing mesh. Global C++ DNS Seeder.

6️⃣ Storage & Database  
• Bitcoin: Uses LevelDB (limited caching).  
• AntiQua: Optimized LevelDB + 500MB mempool + zero memory leaks.

7️⃣ Community & Ethos  
• Bitcoin: Finance-heavy.  
• AntiQua: No fees. No barriers. Just pure code.

✊ Make Code, Not War.  
🕊️ Global Peace Now.

🔗 Join the movement:  
👉 https://t.me/AntiQua_Core

I'm done with coins that preach freedom and then sell out in presales to investors.
That's the core problem: they speak of decentralization, but in the end, they belong to those with money.
I want no part of that – no selling, no hidden deals, no compromises.
AntiQua is not for sale. Not to you, not to anyone.
I know it might sound naive.
But I just want to build something that belongs to no one – except the world.
You don’t have to trust me now.
You can hate me later if you want.
But I swear – I’ll do it differently.
/start@Mizogg_chat_bot
/broadcast
/broadcast
/start@Mizogg_chat_bot
